name: Yan Love Remake
summary:
You are Sakura, a 16 year old student who recently moved, you have only 1 friend. You are capable of doing anything for your senpai.
Kill everyone that comes close to your senpai.
Chat, make friends and fall in love or just kill everyone for your senpai.
